meanings.definition: A decisive or finishing blow or remark.
meanings.sent1: The boxer delivered a powerful sockdologer to his opponent, knocking him out cold.
meanings.sent2: Her witty sockdologer at the end of the debate left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's sockdologer had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent4: His resignation letter was a sockdologer, catching everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent5: The final plot twist in the movie was a sockdologer that no one saw coming.

meanings.sent1: The cake she baked was a real sockdologer, everyone loved it!
meanings.sent2: The view from the mountaintop was a sockdologer, breathtaking and beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The new exhibit at the museum was a sockdologer, drawing in crowds of visitors.
meanings.sent4: His performance in the play was a sockdologer, earning him a standing ovation.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display on New Year's Eve was a sockdologer, lighting up the sky with colors.
